name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

name: Capriciosa Pizza
description: A thin crust pizza topped with tomato sauce, cheese, ham, mushrooms, and oregano.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A savory pizza with a thin and crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce, cheese, spicy pepperoni slices, and a sprinkle of oregano.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A flavorful pizza with a thin and crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce, melted cheese, savory ham, and sweet pineapple chunks.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: A rich pizza with a thin and crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce and a blend of four cheeses: mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan, and fontina.

name: Garden Spice Pizza
description: Thin crust pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, yellow cheese, onions, tomatoes, olives, chili peppers, zucchini, and basil.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Spaghetti served with a rich meat sauce made from ground beef, tomatoes, onions, and herbs.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Al dente spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from egg yolk, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Lasagne al Forno
description: Layers of lasagna noodles, meaty ragu sauce, creamy béchamel sauce, and cheese, baked to perfection.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Wide ribbons of fettuccine pasta coated in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce, made with butter, heavy cream, and plenty of grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Classic Beefy Burger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato slices, pickles, and mayo in a sesame seed bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty grilled to perfection, topped with melted cheese, lettuce, ripe tomato slices, tangy pickles, all nestled between two soft sesame seed buns.

name: Spicy Fry Burger
description: A spicy beef burger stuffed with fries and topped with pulled beef, jalapeños, and hot sauce.

name: Bacon and Egg Burger
description: A delicious combination of a juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, a fried egg, and served on a bun

name: Seafood Paella
description: A Spanish delicacy filled with saffron-infused rice, shrimp, mussels, chorizo, and a medley of vibrant spices.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms and finished with parmesan.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan shavings.

name: Blue Cheese Salad
description: Crisp lettuce with tomatoes, nuts, and tangy blue cheese, dressed in balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A hearty bowl filled with quinoa, roasted veggies, avocado, and a tahini dressing.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafels wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, and a tahini sauce.

name: Tiramisu
description: A decadent blend of espresso-infused ladyfingers, mascarpone, and cocoa dust for a luxurious Italian treat.

name: Lemon Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Apple Pie
description: Tender, spiced apples baked in a flaky crust, served warm with ice cream or whipped cream.
